oracle.pg.common

Class OraclePropertyGraphUtilsBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleConvertersUtilsBase
      • oracle.pg.common.OraclePropertyGraphUtilsBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    oracle.pg.common.messages.MesgConsts
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OraclePropertyGraphUtils, OraclePropertyGraphUtils

    public abstract class OraclePropertyGraphUtilsBase
extends OracleConvertersUtilsBase
implements oracle.pg.common.messages.MesgConsts
    This class contains utility functions to help manage property graphs.

      • compareFiles

        public static final boolean compareFiles(java.lang.String szSrcFile,
                                         java.lang.String szDstFile)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Compare the content of two files contents against each other. This method will read out the contents of the files into a String array, sort the arrays and compare the results.
        Parameters:
        szSrcFile - the name of the first file to compare
        szDstFile - the name of the second file to compare
        Returns:
        true if the files' contents is the same, else return false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Compares two value objects

      • exportEdgeFlatFile

        public static void exportEdgeFlatFile(OraclePropertyGraphBase pg,
                                      java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                      int dop,
                                      boolean append,
                                      boolean closeStream)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports the edges of a given property graph into OPE flat file
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat file. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat file removing all existing data.
        closeStream - whether to close the OutputStream or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportEdges

        public static void exportEdges(java.util.Iterator<OracleEdgeBase>[] itEdgeArray,
                               java.io.OutputStream osEdge)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports a given edges into the output stream using Oracle flat-file format.
        Parameters:
        itEdgeArray - an array of edges iterators
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static final void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraphBase pg,
                                         java.io.OutputStream osVertex,
                                         java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                         int dop,
                                         boolean append)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osVertex - an OutputStream object for the vertex flat file
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraphBase pg,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osVertex,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                   int dop,
                                   boolean append,
                                   boolean closeStreams)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osVertex - an OutputStream object for the vertex flat file
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        closeStreams - whether to close the OutputStreams or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static final void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraphBase pg,
                                         java.lang.String vertexFileName,
                                         java.lang.String edgeFileName,
                                         boolean append)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        vertexFileName - the name of the vertex flat file e.g. graph.opv
        edgeFileName - the name of the edge flat file e.g. graph.ope
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static final void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraphBase pg,
                                         java.lang.String vertexFileName,
                                         java.lang.String edgeFileName,
                                         int dop,
                                         boolean append)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        vertexFileName - the name of the vertex flat file e.g. graph.opv
        edgeFileName - the name of the edge flat file e.g. graph.ope
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getDatatypeAsPropertyType

        public static PropertyType getDatatypeAsPropertyType(java.lang.Class dtClass)
        Gets the PropertyType object based on the given datatype class. For unsupported Property Graph data types in PGX such as Serializable, SimpleRdfDataWrapper, SimpleSpatialDataWrapper, SimpleJsonDataWrapper a String Property Type will be used.
        Parameters:
        dtClass - the class of the datatype
        Returns:
        a PropertyType object.

      • outputEdgeRecord

        public static void outputEdgeRecord(java.io.OutputStream os,
                                    java.lang.Long eid,
                                    java.lang.Long svid,
                                    java.lang.Long dvid,
                                    java.lang.String label,
                                    java.lang.String szPropertyKey,
                                    java.lang.Object value)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method outputs a property (K/V) of an edge, identified by an integer ID, into the given output stream. Note that for performance reasons, the output stream is not flushed.
        Parameters:
        os - output stream
        eid - long integer ID of an edge
        svid - source vertex ID
        dvid - destination vertex ID
        label - edge label
        szPropertyKey - key of a property
        value - value of a property
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • outputVertexRecord

        Parameters:

        vid - long integer ID of a vertex
        szPropertyKey - key of a property
        value - value of a property
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • unescape

        public static final java.lang.String unescape(java.lang.String s)
        Unescapes a string from Oracle flat file format into a regular string. In one scan from left to right, a %2C is replaced with a comma ',', a %09 is replaced with a tab \t, a %0A is replaced with a newline \n, and %25 is replaced with a percentage %.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to be unescaped.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the unescaped string.

                                   java.lang.String element)
